During a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, Civilian Units have +2 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and are [ICON_PRODUCTION] produced +100% faster, and cities begin with additional territory. Founded cities always begin with your State Religion.

The great School of Salamanca is a pre-eminent institution for confronting the evils of humanism and for strenghtening the doctrine of natural law. It should please God thus that we, His humble servant, should patronize His most esteemed and sacred school of thought.
